DOC.brief_summary: Pathophysiology of polymyalgia rheumatica (PMR) is ill defined. This study aims at characterizing immunological abnormalities in PMR patients, and to assess the effects of tocilizumab therapy on this abnormalities.
DOC.brief_title: Lymphocyte and Cytokine Disturbances in Polymyalgia Rheumatica
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison of PMR patients and matched control subjects.
DOC.criteria: PMR patient included in the TENOR study with samples available Patient not included in the TENOR study
